title: Coco Huang
author: Coco Huang
content: Are you interested in Oil Cooling System? BoxTechy offers one stop solution Liquid Cooling Systems for crypto mining. Higher your hash rate by overclocking with oil cooling immersion systems. It greatly benefits to mine Bitcoin.1. Increase the hash rate by up to 40%. 2. Low failure of miners (compared with air cooling).3. Life prolongation of miners.4. Environmentally friendly.5. Heat energy reuse.6. Almost no noise.7. Reduce labor costs.

comments.author: nc50lc
comments.body: You should post this in the proper "marketplace" board: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=5.0In either "Services" or "Computer hardware" (if it's hardware related) child-boards, depending on the nature of your service.Note that topics like this is allowed in those boards only if you're accepting Bitcoin as payment.There's a small "move topic" button below the page.
